CB-B88S
Home
CB-B88S
Features	Specs	Support
Carrying Bag for Slim 88-Note Keyboards

The CB-B88S bag is an ideal carrying solution for slim 88-note keyboards such as the RD-88 EX, FP-30X, and other Roland portable piano models. Whether using the comfortable carrying handle or padded shoulder strap, getting around town is easy with this quality bag.

Standard Features
Fits 88-note Roland keyboards such as the RD-88 EX, RD-08, FP-30X, FP-10, and GO:PIANO88 (GO-88PX)
Durable polyester exterior
Thick foam padding and soft fleece lining
Comfortable and durable carrying handle
Detachable shoulder strap
Large and small accessory pockets
Rugged zipper pulls
Inside dimensions: 1300 x 300 x 160 mm
Excellent Protection

The CB-B88S protects your portable piano while traveling to gigs, lessons, and jam sessions. It features a durable polyester exterior and a thick padded interior with soft fleece lining, plus two internal hook-and-loop straps to secure the instrument and eliminate movement.

Carrying Comfort

The CB-B88S features a cushioned handle for short walks and moving the bag, along with a removable shoulder strap that’s attached diagonally for stability and comfort while carrying your instrument over longer distances.

Two Storage Pockets

The CB-B88S has a large pocket for storing pedals, cables, AC cords, and other accessories, plus a slim pocket for a smartphone, music notes, and other smaller items.
